titles.title: Infant Formula Protection Act of 2013
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to treat infant formula as adulterated if its use-by-date has passed.
Infant Formula Protection Act of 2013

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Infant Formula Protection Act of 2013 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to deem an infant formula, including an infant formula powder, to be adulterated if its use-by date has passed.
